CHAT.comment: ALABAMA, ET AL., Plaintiffs Orig. v. NORTH CAROLINA
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 10:06 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF CARTER G. PHILLIPS ON BEHALF OF THE PLAINTIFFS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF EDWIN S. KNEEDLER ON BEHALF OF THE UNITED STATES AS AMICUS CURIAE, IN SUPPORT OF NEITHER PARTY
ORAL ARGUMENT OF WALTER DELLINGER ON BEHALF OF THE DEFENDANT
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF CARTER G. PHILLIPS ON BEHALF OF THE PLAINTIFFS
(Whereupon, at 11:37 a.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
